Subject: Wellbeing Week 2025
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	

Wellbeing Week is Back!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/26aee8e4f3448745ce3d9ae5f6dc0b46749607167.gif> 	

Our 4th Annual Wellbeing Week is happening this September across all our offices, malls, and warehouses. It’s your chance to take a moment for yourself and check in on your health. 


Block your calendars and join us for a week filled with health checks designed exclusively for you. The health checks offer a range of free health screenings and consultations, covering the different dimensions of wellbeing.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/7f17f9c1cf61bef72874a67696ecb165841070101.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/8750ce7a1d376c3ce9bd2363b002b031941470836.png> 	

For more information or questions, check out our post on
